abstract.text: Record types and the query interface build SQL queries for you
An SQL literal.
The virtual table module for the FTS3 full-text engine.
The default name of the database table is derived from the name of
the type.
Deletes records identified by their primary or unique keys, and returns
the number of deleted records.
The
sets up a one-to-one connection with
another record. This association indicates that the declaring record can be
matched with one instance of another record by proceeding through a third
record.

indicates a one-to-many connection between two
record types, such as each instance of the declaring record “has many”
instances of the other record.

Deletes the record identified by its primary or unique keys, and returns
whether a record was deleted.
The
is often used to set up a many-to-many
connection with another record. This association indicates that the
declaring record can be matched with zero or more instances of another
record by proceeding through a third record.
A base class for types that can be fetched and persisted in the database.

Thes
sets up a one-to-one connection from a record
type to another record type, such as each instance of the declaring record
“belongs to” an instance of the other record.
